product_name: The North Face Banchee 50 Pack - Women's
long_description: An ideal pack for forays into the backcountry, The North Face Banchee 50 Pack for women has a comfortable, gender-specific fit and no shortage of pockets for organizing and accessing your gear. Women-specific harness and hipbelt; OPTIFIT(TM) adjustment system ensures perfect fit. Dynamic frame system for comfortable freedom of motion. Top-loading main compartment; floating lid; 8+ pockets. The North Face Banchee 50 Pack features 2 tool keepers and a beaver-tail flap compartment.
short_description: An ideal pack for forays into the backcountry, The North Face Banchee 50 Pack for women has a comfortable, gender-specific fit and no shortage of pockets for organizing and accessing your gear.
